Name: Rimeflow Rapier
Title: Frost Operative: Rimeflow Rapier
Source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge against the Frost Operative at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives in a Friendly Fracas

Talent.Name: Rimeflow Rapier
Talent.Desc:
$[K1]: Equip this card when your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A2104]</color>
After equipping this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S21042]</color> once.
After your <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A2104]</color>, who has this card equipped, triggers <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[S21044]</color>: Causes the <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C122]</color> stacks the opponent's active character has to double.
(You must have $[A2104] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

K1.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>
K1.Desc: After you finish 1 Combat Action, it will be your opponent's turn.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Playing a card from your Hand with this rule is also a Combat Action rather than a Fast Action</color>.

C122.Name: Bond of Life
C122.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When the character to which this is attached is healed:</color> This effect will be consumed once for every $[K3] it has to negate 1 HP of healing received. (Cannot negate revives or healing caused by redistribution of HP)\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 1</color> (Can stack, no stack limit).

K3.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>
K3.Desc: After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color> remaining.
